Summary: Out at a baseball game and looked up and saw these 3 red lights in the sky.
divs: sighting detailsi was at my friends baseball game and sometime during the game i happend to look up in the sky and i saw these three red lights moving in a triangle shape. i then got the attention of another person at got him to look at it. it was in the sky for about 30 minutes then it vanished. i was so shocked i didnt know what to do. please help. [cms\tg\pid]
